s_synopsis: The Mana Tree Needs Defenders! The location of the Mana Tree -- Wellspring of all life -- has long been lost to legend. Many centuries have passed, and the Granz Realm's Dark Lord is searching for the secrets of the ancient tree so that he can control the source of Mana. Now, a young hero and heroine must come together to defeat the evil that threatens both the mystical tree and the world itself.
